data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Bragantino at Arena do Gremio.
Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 3, Claudinho (Bragantino) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Gremio.
In the minute 7, Gremio to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a throw-in for Gremio, close to Bragantino's area.
Bragantino have a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Can Gremio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bragantino's half?
Claudinho for Bragantino drives towards goal at Arena do Gremio. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In the minute 13, Free kick Bragantino.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Gremio throw-in in Bragantino's half.
In the minute 17, In Porto Alegre Gremio drive forward through Diego Souza. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Gremio push forward at Arena do Gremio and Diego Souza gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bragantino defence.
In the minute 20, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Bragantino.
Important block from the Gremio defence as Edimar fires in a strike for Bragantino.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 22, Throw-in Bragantino.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Bragantino at Arena do Gremio.
Tomas Cuello gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bragantino.
Can Gremio capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 26, Gremio's Diego Souza breaks free at Arena do Gremio. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Bragantino a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 28, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Bragantino needs to be cautious. Gremio have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Bragantino.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
In the minute 33, Free kick for Gremio in the half of Bragantino.
Claudinho (Bragantino) gets a yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Porto Alegre to check on Luis Orejuela, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 37, Gremio's Luis Orejuela is back in action after a slight knock.
Bragantino's Artur gets in a shot on goal at Arena do Gremio. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 41, Throw-in Bragantino.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 44, Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Gremio.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Bragantino at Arena do Gremio.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, Savio Pereira Sampaio has blown to start the second-half.
Luiz Fernando for the home team is judged to be offside.
The home team replace Robinho with Isaque.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Gremio.
In Porto Alegre Bragantino drive forward through Ytalo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, Bragantino's Artur gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 51, Tomas Cuello for Bragantino drives towards goal at Arena do Gremio. But the finish is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Bragantino at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 52, Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bragantino have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In Porto Alegre, Lucas Evangelista of Bragantino is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in Gremio.
In the minute 61, Lucas Silva is on a sub for Maicon for Gremio.
Ferreira is replacing Luiz Fernando for the home team.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 63, David Braz (Gremio) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Gremio close to the penalty box.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, In Porto Alegre Bragantino attack through Claudinho. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 67, Gremio's Ferreira gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bragantino defender.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Mauricio Barbieri is making the team's first substitution at Arena do Gremio with Ricardo Ryller replacing Ytalo.
Bragantino make their second substitution with Chrigor replacing Aderlan.
In the minute 68, Mauricio Barbieri (Bragantino) is making a third substitution, with Jan Hurtado replacing Tomas Cuello.
Diego Churin is on a sub for Diego Souza for Gremio.
In the minute 68, Goal! Gremio have got their heads in front thanks to a David Braz strike.
Lucas Evangelista of Bragantino smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in high up the field for Bragantino in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 71, Throw-in Bragantino.
Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Luis Orejuela extends Gremio's lead to 2-0.
In the minute 72, Great play from Isaque to set up the goal.
Bragantino drive upfield and Jan Hurtado gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Gremio defender.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In the minute 74, Bragantino surge into the attack at Arena do Gremio but Liggerâ€™s header is off-target.
Gremio have a goal kick.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 76, Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
Ferreira for Gremio gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Bragantino a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Jan Hurtado keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 2-1.
Raul with an assist there.
Free kick Gremio.
In the minute 81, In Porto Alegre Gremio attack through Isaque. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
Gremio pushes forward through Isaque, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 83, Can Gremio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bragantino's half?
The home team have replaced Pepe with Bruno Cortez. This is the fifth substitution made today by Renato Gaucho.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 84, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Bragantino throw-in in Gremio's half.
Thonny Anderson is replacing Claudinho for Bragantino at Arena do Gremio.
Morato is replacing Artur for the away team.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Gremio.
Free kick in a good position for Bragantino!
Lucas Silva (Gremio) has received a yellow card from Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 87, Bragantino are coming forward and Lucas Evangelista gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bragantino have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
Throw-in for Bragantino close to the penalty box.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Bragantino just outside Gremio's area.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
